u.a: <1w> sits on floor next to Keith . holds book
points to book . points to top of page
smiles about what he said . shakes head
<1w> looks at book . <1w-15w> looks at Keith
leans toward Keith and rests her head on Keith's
smiles at Keith . looks at Keith
turns page . has troubled with glued page . fumbles with page
<1w> helps turn page . turns page again
<1w> puts palm toward Keith's head . opens and closes hand
